definition: A term commonly employed to describe an exceptionally fast duration or period of time, often associated with achieving a specific task or completing an activity in an impressively short amount of time.

examples.german: Sie hat den Rekord in der Disziplin aufgestellt.
examples.english: She set the record in the discipline.

examples.german: Er hat den Marathon in Rekordzeit beendet.
examples.english: He finished the marathon in record time.

examples.german: Das Flugzeug erreichte sein Ziel in Rekordzeit.
examples.english: The airplane reached its destination in record time.

examples.german: Der Schwimmer schwamm die Strecke in Rekordzeit.
examples.english: The swimmer swam the distance in record time.

examples.german: Sie hat den Rekord f√ºr die meisten Tore gebrochen.
examples.english: She broke the record for the most goals.
